website_summaries.verdict: Thin gloves provide a good grip, yet also give hitters the feel they need for bat control.
pros: Good price point for a set of batting gloves
Thin fabrics that are breathable, keeping your hands from sweating
High level of flexibility in the fabric that ensures you can control the bat properly
You'll be able to select from 3 different size options and 5 colors
cons: Some problems with quality control and receiving proper size

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, construction and color.  Everything we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves these gloves. They are comfortable, well constructed and durable. The orange and black fit with our team colors perfectly. These aren't the cheapest gloves out there, and you get what you pay for. These are her second pair, only because she lost the first ones. I bought her size medium and they are a touch big for her nine year old hands, but that cuts down on the time it takes her to put them on and off in the dugout.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Cervelli Bopp

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, especially for the price.  Slightly large/big
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, especially for the price! They're mid-weight, not too thick and not too thin, soft, flexible and protective. Good for lessons, practices, and batting cages. You don't have to worry about blisters that they get from the thin gloves. Hoping the white will stay white, time will have to tell. Glove does fit a little bit large/big, but nothing drastic. We ordered a Youth Large. Update: After one hour of hitting, my son got blisters on his fingers and hand. So, not as protective as we had thought!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought a large for my 8 year old who wears a youth large or size 10. He is tall and slender. These are almost a perfect fit, small amount of room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Like.... but stains hands.
customer_reviews.text: Like these gloves the only downfall is the dye.... or whatever stains my sons hands when it is hot and sweaty out. So he will have dark blue fingers for a little bit. Not a huge deal otherwise the gloves are great and do their job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves them & perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Size youth medium is a perfect fit for my 11.5 yr old son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found it to be a bit small for a youth large.  :(
customer_reviews.text: Found it to be a bit small for a youth large. :(

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: perf material, but mid size is acutally for woman hand

customer_reviews.title: The product is fine.
customer_reviews.text: As with all sporting gear sizes, these are hard to judge. Turned out too big for my kid (who will grow into them). The product is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter loves them...nice quality and fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: brmcla1

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought a large for my 10 y/o son. Slightly big initially but he has grown into them. He has used them ALOT over the last 6 months, and they have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving them!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves. They have a little padding so he likes to wear one under his mitt as well.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last, tore immediately.
customer_reviews.text: These ripped in a couple places after a short period of use. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaMomOfBoys

customer_reviews.title: These are not youth sized gloves. These are adult ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not youth sized gloves. These are adult size. I am a grown woman and these are too large on me, so they will definitely not fit my young child. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 10 year old. They are tight but he can squeeze into them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Snug fit,for my 12 year old son. I guess that what it's supposed to be - part of your body. The construction of these gloves is excellent. Look great and fit well with a little give. Will try them out this week.

customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves. He says they really help with his grip on the bat as well as reducing vibration. They fit well and are well made.

customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Wish they came a bit smaller as my 10 year old is on the smaller side. He likes them and says they are comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Well made but not quite what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 8 year old. It's a bit on the big size. He was previously using Under Armour. This is a great deal thicker than the Under Armour. Sweat may be a problem but my son hasn't complained. I think they're well made but the thickness is making me rethink on the next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KatD

customer_reviews.title: These are sized correctly and feel ok, the big ...
customer_reviews.text: These are sized correctly and feel ok, the big problem is that they stain the hands really badly. After a couple of batting practices they are still doing it.
customer_reviews.author: John Mueller

customer_reviews.title: nice for small hands
customer_reviews.text: they're great but i'm in high school 130lbs 5' 4" and i thought i could get away with a large but they're still pretty tight

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great, however, I ordered 2 of the same size for my children, ages 5 & 7, youth small. these are a little bit big on my 7 YO and a lot too big on my 5 YO. My kid's teammates have smaller gloves in size YS, so I would say these run large comparatively.
customer_reviews.author: MEGAN LOHRENTZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit. My son has very small hands for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit. My son has very small hands for a 9 yr old, and these fit very well. I'll buy these batting gloves again when it's time for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great glove but runs big.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of gloves, they appear to be high quality. My daughter can fit a small glove in other brands but these are sized more like a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mizuno Youth Vintage Pro Batting Gloves
product_meta.description:
Mizuno's sensor point palm, strategically applies embossed locations for improved grip. Mizuno Xtension design allows the glove to flex with your hand as you grip the bat. Mizuno air mesh utilized for improved breathability. 3D logo applications used for professional look. Top quality leather palm, (No Suggestions) wrist tab with molded pull tab for secure fit. Same design as worn by top MLB players.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :1.25 x 14.5 x 11.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :330290.5151.10.L
 * Department :Boys
 * Date First Available :October 24, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Mizuno
 * ASIN :B00OV15JWI

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #159,428 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #119 inBaseball & Softball Batting Gloves 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars132 ratings Mizuno's sensor point palm, strategically applies embossed locations for improved grip. Mizuno Xtension design allows the glove to flex with your hand as you grip the bat. Mizuno air mesh utilized for improved breathability. 3D logo applications used for professional look. Top quality leather palm, (No Suggestions) wrist tab with molded pull tab for secure fit. Same design as worn by top MLB players.
